appName: Horse Legend: Horse Racing & Riding Game
displayName: Horse Legend: Horse Racing & Riding Game
display_name: Horse Legend: Horse Racing & Riding Game
display_long_description:
Experience the thrill of horse riding and racing like never before! In Horse Legend, train, customize, and race your majestic horses across stunning landscapes. Compete in fast-paced races, master challenging tracks, and prove your skills in various game modes. Whether you enjoy free riding, training, or intense competition, this game delivers an unforgettable equestrian adventure!

Key Features
Realistic Horse Riding – Feel the excitement with immersive controls and smooth animations.
Breathtaking Environments – Ride through open fields, forests, mountains, and racetracks.
Multiple Game Modes – Experience free riding, time trials, championships, and obstacle courses.
Train & Upgrade Your Horse – Improve speed, stamina, and agility for competitive racing.
Customize Your Horse & Rider – Choose unique breeds, saddles, outfits, and accessories.
Exciting Competitions – Race against skilled AI riders and climb the leaderboard.

Are You Ready to Ride?
Saddle up, take the reins, and embark on your journey to become a horse racing champion! Download Horse Legend now and make your mark in the equestrian world!
